meanings.definition: Showing or expressing warmth and kindness
meanings.sent1: The puppy was friendlier than the grumpy cat.
meanings.sent2: The sunflower is friendlier than the prickly cactus.
meanings.sent3: The friendlier squirrel shared its acorns with the others.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and friendlier as a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The friendlier greeting made everyone feel welcome.
